My Creative Process

All of my design and development projects are based on a user-centered design to improve the user's overall experience as much as possible

1

Research & analysis

Empathizing with the user and understanding their needs as well as the problem in hand

2

Ideation & design

After analizing the problem, I brainstorm then design solutions

3

Implementation

Full implementation and development of the design solution

4

Evaluation

Testing and evaluating the usability of the solution with users then iterating and repeating the process
